## Reproduction steps

Scala version: (Is the bug only in Scala 3.x? If so, report it at https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/issues/new/choose instead.)

```scala
scala> println("hello, world")
hello, world!
```

## Problem

Explain how the above behavior isn't what you expected.
